post:
Hi All,

My name's Magnus @ [VortexNode.com](http://www.vortexnode.com) - we've been in business since 2013 and recently became part of the [Linovus](http://www.linovus.ca) family. With that, we have launched our dedicated servers in the UK.

Here's a deal that's exclusive to LET, you won't find it anywhere else or find them cheaper.

Intel Atom Dual Core 1.8GHz

2GB DDR3 RAM / 250GB HD

6TB Bandwidth on 100Mbps Port

3 IPv4 IP Addresses & IPv6 also available

All branded hardware - IPMI built-in & included

Servers are located in Maidenhead, in the Thames Valley.

ONLY $14.99/month with an exclusive LET coupon - LETATOM

[Order Now - Get yours today!](https://www.vortexnode.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=21) - Payments through PayPal

(They've been advertised at $29/month elsewhere - that's 50% discount with this LET coupon.)

Manage your dedicated server through our in-house management panel; monitor bandwidth usage, restart your server and adjust your rDNS.

We've got a limited quantity in stock and all orders will be deployed within <24hrs of ordering.

Need something else? I can do some crazy deals on our new servers in the UK at the moment to boost our launch of this location.

You can contact us through Live Chat, Telephone, E-mail or through the ticketing system.

Feel free to also reach out to me directly if you have any questions.
